content.en: Flower pollination optimization: Researchers have been analyzing and comparing the performances of the flower pollination algorithm and its variants to state-of-the-art algorithms. They have also studied how the flower pollination algorithm performs for continuous optimization and compared it to the Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithm. Additionally, they have proposed and tested modified versions of the flower pollination algorithm to overcome its limitations and improve global optimization.
content.da: Optimering af blomsterbestøvning: Forskere har analyseret og sammenlignet ydelserne af blomsterbestøvningsalgoritmen og dens varianter med de nyeste algoritmer. De har også undersøgt, hvordan blomsterbestøvningsalgoritmen klare sig til kontinuerlig optimering og sammenlignet den med Partikelsværmsoptimeringsalgoritmen. Derudover har de foreslået og testet modificerede versioner af blomsterbestøvningsalgoritmen for at overvinde dens begrænsninger og forbedre global optimering.
